code:
import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';// Importing translation files
import translationFA from'../src/locales/fa.json';import translationEN from'../src/locales/en.json';//Creating object with the variables of imported translation files
var resources={en:{translation:translationEN},fa:{translation:translationFA}};//i18N Initialization
i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:resources,lng:'fa',//default language
keySeparator:false,interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
